headline: David Foss, Former President and CEO of Jack Henry, Appointed to WEX Board of Directors
summary: PORTLAND, Maine, October 29, 2025--WEX (NYSE: WEX), the global commerce platform that simplifies the business of running a business, today announced that David Foss has been appointed to its Board of Directors, effective November 3, 2025. Mr. Foss’s appointment is the result of an extensive search process with the assistance of an independent recruitment firm.
